titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a treatyse how the hye fader of heuen sendeth dethe to somon euery creature to come and gyue a counte of theyr lyues in this worlde and is in maner of a morall playe.
Everyman.
Here begynneth a treatyse how the hye fader of heuen sendeth dethe to somon euery creature to come and gyue a counte of theyr lyues in this worlde and is in maner of a morall playe.
Everyman.

notesStmt.note: An edition of "Everyman," possibly translated from a Dutch original.
This edition has "how the" in the title; quire C missigned D, with catch-title on (C)1r "The somonynge" and Skot's device (McKerrow 59B) with his name on (C)4v.
Identified as STC 10605 on UMI reel 789.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
